title: Riot, your store duped me out 975 RP
body:
I've already posted this on Help & Support, but felt like this might be a bug in store.

I made a $20 purchase today and received 2800 RP, I already had 498 RP in my balance, which resulted in a total of me having 3200 rp. I bought Shyvana (720 RP) and her Boneclaw Skin (520). This cost me 1240 RP. So I'm down to 1960 RP. I decided I have enough for one more champ with a skin, and decided on Quinn and her Woad Skin. As soon as I buy Quinn, my RP drops to 29. 1960-975 RP does not =29. Where the hell is my other 980 RP points Rito??????? I'm extremely frustrated right now. I should have had enough to get Quinn and her Woad skin. Please fix this.

I would also like to add, that the three purchases I made, do not even add up to the 2800 I purchased. Only about 2200. So I am out 400 RP. Why is this? How does something like this happen.

replies.body:
Hey ShogunGojira, 

Sometimes, IP/RP balances display improperly after a purchase. Re-logging your client should resolve the issue.

Thank you for responding. I appreciate it very much. I should've tried to purchase the skin I wanted without jumping to conclusions so suddenly. I was just a bit shocked when my RP plummeted to 29 so suddenly.

> [{quoted}](name=ShogunGojira,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=f1KZBRJT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-29T22:03:08.737+0000)
>
> Thank you for responding. I appreciate it very much. I should've tried to purchase the skin I wanted without jumping to conclusions so suddenly. I was just a bit shocked when my RP plummeted to 29 so suddenly.

No worries at all. I've actually freaked out for the same reason before. :P
ok.... Um, nevermind. I went ahead and tried to purchase the Woad Quinn skin, even though my balance tracker said 29, and was able to purchase it anyway. So, I don't need the 975. That was weird.
